Name: Sapper boom!
About the game: You are a sapper and your task in this game is to neutralize as many mines and bombs as you can in this endless Match-3 game. You will have to work quickly, but neatly, otherwise you will suffer not only you, but civilians around. Achievements + Soundtrack + Match3 game + War theme +
